title: strings.Split traverse the string twice when split?
body:
go 1.5.2 linux x86

in src/strings/strings.go genSplit
when n < 0, called by strings.Split n=-1
first count sep, traversed once
then do split, traversed once more, it sees low efficiency.

if we could estimate N, use strings.SplitN is ok, but if we couldn't get N ?
